title: Azure IoT Edge Dev Tool Introduction (Dev)
description: The Azure IoT Edge Dev Tool is a CLI tool that automates the inner-loop dev cycle (dev, test, debug) via simple one-liner commands. Those same commands can then be used in your outer-loop devops cycle, which brings a consistent experience throughout your entire IoT Edge dev process.
